official_title: To provide for a 10 percent reduction in pay for Members of Congress.
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text: Freezes the annual rate of pay for Members of Congress through December 31, 2012, and reduces it by 10% in 2013.

titles.title: To provide for a 10 percent reduction in pay for Members of Congress.
